title: Yankees stay busy, acquire Bellinger from Cubs
description: The Cubs have traded Cody Bellinger and cash considerations to the Yankees for right-hander Cody Poteet.
author: Jeff Passan

title: Falcons coach noncommittal on Cousins as QB1
description: Falcons coach Raheem Morris was noncommittal Tuesday when asked if Kirk Cousins would remain the team's starting quarterback for Sunday's game against the Giants.
author: Marc Raimondi

title: Hodgkinson wins Sports Personality of the Year 2024
description: Olympic 800m gold medallist Keely Hodgkinson is voted BBC Sports Personality of the Year 2024.

title: Hodgkinson 'pretty close' to breaking 800m world record
description: Keely Hodgkinson says she has the 800m world record in her sights after the Olympic champion was named BBC Sports Personality of the Year.

title: Arsenal, Spurs, Man Utd, Newcastle - Why they need to win Carabao Cup
description: Ahead of a fascinating midweek of Carabao Cup quarter-final action, Sky Sports' writers compile the reasons why each of the remaining eight sides need a victory to continue their hopes of silverware.

title: Fury: I should have taken £10m hit to push back first Usyk fight
description: Tyson Fury says it would have been "sensible" for him to delay his first heavyweight title fight with Oleksandr Usyk, which would have resulted in the Brit incurring a £10m fine.

title: Yankees get former MVP Bellinger in trade with Cubs
description: New York isn't sitting on its hands after losing Juan Soto in free agency. The Yankees reportedly acquired former NL MVP Coby Bellinger in a deal with Chicago.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Falcons coach Raheem Morris declines to commit to Kirk Cousins as starting QB: Is it Michael Penix Jr. time?
description: Morris has been steadfast throughout the season in his support for Cousins. But he wavered when asked about Atlanta's starting quarterback on Monday.
author: Yahoo Sports
